channel.title: [LOG] Reputation
channel.description:
Alright, I feel like posting a little log/blog of the 'Rep' system on moparscape. I really think it's funny how people follow this system, whenever it is so easily abused. I personally it should be removed altogether. Refer to the below quote. [quote="Z Prototype"]Dude, I along with everyone else on the forums would greatly appreciate it if you stopped trolling. [b]Your ever decreasing reputation shows this,[/b] I don't know if your having some sort of crisis or something but you need to stop it with the attitude. I haven't seen one positive post from you. Everything you say is negative, downing everyone's idea's and contributions yet you contribute nothing yourself. Your a depressive person who ruins this community. Either get your act together or just leave, no one wants you here.[/quote] Apparently, because of my 'rep' decreasing, results in the idea that everyone wishes me to leave these forums, as I 'troll'. (Yet to find a post of me trolling). Below is my Rep Change Description, which if you notice who REP-'d me, are all tryhards.
Who Whom Amount For What Where When Pigrear (+10/-105) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 Abuse - mscp In topic Today at 04:04:18 PM nacional (+13/-19) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 wall of text - mscp In topic Today at 11:04:48 AM vortex (+57/-102) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 ?? faggot - mscp In topic Today at 10:25:59 AM snoopy89 (+10/-101) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 unnecessary to be bitching about, get a life outside your door - mscp In topic Today at 05:25:10 AM all day (+10/-31) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) 2 Nice guide. - mscp In topic Today at 12:55:10 AM Natey (+9/-200) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) 13 nice tutorial rep++ - mscp In topic Today at 12:13:51 AM pompio (+10/-41) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) 2 i support you:) - mscp In topic June 19, 2010, 09:00:17 PM gawdz666 (+10/-100) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) 6 Kryptix is fails - mscp In topic June 19, 2010, 08:22:18 PM Kryptix (+10/-200) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 nj In topic June 19, 2010, 01:59:15 AM Nemesis- (+10/-75) ☺Riley☺ (+10/-25) -1 kiddo. - mscp In topic June 18, 2010, 06:14:56 AM
Now, the only legit -rep on there is Zilent's, which is somewhat valid, although I disagree with the 'upcomming RSC Developer' part. As you can see, all of the other -rep's are abuse of the system, showing that it is flawed. Just felt like pointing that out, and to show Z prototype's PM he sent me, as I actually laughed whenever I read it. xD EDIT: Another point is that some people, such as Kryptix have acquired the maximum 'rep' on here, '200', without contributing to development whatsoever, compared to other community members that have created multiple tutorials, guides, and helped others to get the 'rep', (although I doubt they care about it). Also, thanks to everyone that is helping me achieve my goal of '0' rep. I love all of you try-hards, and hope you continue to aid me in my quest. EDIT:EDIT: Z Prototype responded after his first message with this; [quote="Z Prototype"]Fuck your a depressing person. Get over yourself.[/quote] I think he's a little mad. Also, I will continue updating my REP change long as more and more people +/- rep me. I find it humorous.

item.title: [LOG] Reputation
item.dc:creator: @_Riley1 ☺Riley☺
item.description:
@_Riley1 wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:40, topic:344978”][quote author=☺Riley☺ link=topic=441355.msg3242950#msg3242950 date=1277080227]

Uhmmm…

Date Registered:
June 11, 2010, 08:02:58 PM

Yeah, that says 2008.

Thanks, you just have proven your stupidity. Please, don’t comment on a thread without reading it. I’ve commented numerous times that I’ve gone under many different aliases.
[/quote]So basically you just admitted to having more than one account on here?
Not very smart.

And 2008 isn’t very long, even though I joined in early 2009 (on an old account I forgot the password to) I’ve been lurking on MITB and Moparscape since June-July 2006, but since I was new to the internet world I didn’t know how to register.[/quote]
I didn’t admit to having multiple accounts, don’t put words in my mouth.

[quote=“Riley​:slight_smile:, post:37, topic:344978”][quote author=Natey link=topic=441355.msg3242921#msg3242921 date=1277078308]
Go Q.Q some more about how you get -repped because you’re a newfag.
[/quote]
Newfag? I’ve been here actively since '08, but good try.[/quote]
I lurked as well.

Java Is My Bitch:

reputation is fucking retarded anyways.

I agree, but I’m trying to prove a point that too many set it as a standard, whenever it is inaccurate.

Read full topic
